activities:
Email Marketing Agency

What information do we collect? 
We collect personal information from you when you fill in an enquiry form or ask to be placed on the Alchemy Worx email list. We also collect information automatically about your visits to our site, such as browsing patterns. However information collected in this way is only used in aggregate form rather than being linked to identifiable individuals. 
How do we use it? 
We use personal information collected via Alchemy Worx.com in the following ways: To notify you about the latest Alchemy Worx news, expert articles and changes to our web site, via the Alchemy Worx ezine. This will only be sent if you have specifically opted-in and therefore given us permission to send it to you. To process your enquiry and provide the most appropriate response. We may also use information in aggregate form to help us analyse, develop and manage the site.
privacyprograms: Being UK based we comply with the EU Data Directive in England
recoursemech: The Information Commissioner's Office (ICO), UK / EU DPAs
